name: Balboa Park
cost: Free admission to park grounds; museum entry varies ($5-$20).
description: A cultural oasis with museums, gardens, and the San Diego Zoo.

name: Gaslamp Quarter
cost: Free to explore; dining and entertainment prices vary.
description: Historic district with nightlife, dining, and Victorian architecture.

name: Sunset Cliffs Lookout
address: 1250 Sunset Cliffs Blvd, San Diego, CA 92107
description: A breathtaking coastal viewpoint known for dramatic ocean vistas and golden hour photography.

name: Mission Bay Eco Center
cost: $10 suggested donation; some activities may have fees.
description: An interactive hub for environmental education and water-based recreation in Mission Bay Park.

name: Old Town Artisan Market
description: A vibrant marketplace showcasing local crafts, food vendors, and cultural performances.

name: Pacific Ridge Innovation Hub
cost: Access by appointment or event registration; some coworking fees apply.
description: A collaborative space for startups and tech entrepreneurs driving San Diego's innovation economy.

name: Seaport Village Promenade
address: 849 W Harbor Dr, San Diego, CA 92101
cost: Free to walk; shopping and dining prices vary.
description: A charming waterfront district with boutique shops, eateries, and live entertainment.

name: Cabrillo Cultural Center
address: 1800 Cabrillo Memorial Dr, San Diego, CA 92106
cost: $10 per adult; $5 for children and seniors.
description: A heritage site honoring Juan Rodr√≠guez Cabrillo with exhibits on exploration and native history.
